actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Motion to discharge the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources rejected in Senate, roll call #83 (16-81).

official_title: A resolution to approve standby emergency weekend sales restrictions on gasoline (Department of Energy Standby Conservation Plan numbered one).

summary.text: Expresses the approval of the Senate of the Department of Energy Standby Conservation Plan No. 1 (relating to weekend gasoline sales restrictions).

titles.title: A resolution to approve standby emergency weekend sales restrictions on gasoline (Department of Energy Standby Conservation Plan numbered one).
